title: How is it possible that 1970 was 50 years ago? It feels like yesterday. - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve been working off and on since I graduated in 68 and it seemed like time was dragging, but now since I retired about 14 years ago, it seems time flies! I can remember when I was at work, I couldn’t wait to leave! And now it’s 2019! Time does fly! And it’s Fall already! What happened to summer? And before you know it, it’ll be Christmas! So, time doesn’t stand still. I still can remember the sixties and the seventies. But that’s all in the past. All I have now are memories. That’s something I can hold on to.
